abstract: As it hinted to fans, Linkin Park, the rock band, played a concert for Apple in New York. But it was simply a performance at an Apple store, not part of a product announcement event.
snippet: As it hinted to fans, Linkin Park, the rock band, played a concert for Apple in New York. But it was simply a performance at an Apple store, not part of a product announcement event.
lead_paragraph: Sometimes, a secret rock concert is just a secret rock concert.

headline.main: Linkin Park Sings for Apple, but Doesn’t Pitch Products
